item.title: Bitcoin briefly surpassed $116,000, with a nearly 3.15% price increase in the past hour.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly exceeded $116,000 and is currently trading at $116,008, with a 1-hour price increase of 3.15%.

item.title: In the past hour, the total amount of liquidated positions across the whole network has expanded to $236 million, with the primary position being a short.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, the network-wide liquidation within nearly 1 hour expanded to $236 million, and the short liquidations totaled $195 million.

item.title: Bitcoin OG Whale's Long ETH Position Unrealized Gain Tops $40 Million
item.description: On August 22nd, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, with the ETH price breaking through $4600, the unrealized gains of a Bitcoin OG whale from taking a long position in ETH have exceeded $40 million. It is reported that the whale holds a position of up to 135,265 ETH, which is valued at $5.77 billion.

item.title: Analysis: Powell's Speech Suggests High Likelihood of Continuous Rate Cuts Starting in September
item.description: On August 22nd, Market strategist Art Hogan stated that Powell's capability to discuss the shifting balance of risks indicates that policy might need to make corresponding adjustments. This serves as a clear indication that he is inclined to support future rate cuts and may take action in September, October, and December. In other words, the impetus clearly stems from the softness of the labor market rather than the core commodity price increases resulting from tariffs... The distinct message conveyed to the market is: A September rate cut is now highly likely. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: Tom Lee referenced his "TGIF rally" call, citing Powell's comments were read as 'dovish,' bullish for crypto.
item.description: On August 22nd, Tom Lee made a post on the X Platform stating that Powell's speech was regarded as "dovish," which was as expected and bullish for crypto (BTC, ETH).In a referenced tweet, Tom Lee predicted on August 19th: When having conversations with institutional investors, more of them are expecting Fed Chair Powell to be "hawkish" as he doesn't want to be compelled to cut rates. Since this is the "base case," his statement is likely to be perceived as "dovish." This indicates that the stock market may rise on Friday after the Jackson Hole event.

item.title: Hot meme coins are experiencing mixed movements, with OKB down 2.31% in the past hour and BIO up 13.68% in the past hour.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market information, following Powell's dovish statements, Bitcoin and Ethereum witnessed a short-term breakthrough and a surge. However, recently, among the strong altcoins, there have been mixed gains and losses, and they have not shown a corresponding surge in Bitcoin and Ethereum. Among them:In the past 1 hour, OKB fell by 2.31% and is now trading at $213.63;In the past 1 hour, SOL rose by 4.07% and is now trading at $188.66;In the past 1 hour, BIO rose by 13.68% and is now trading at $0.2326.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Soar, SBET Up Over 10%
item.description: On August 22nd, US stock crypto concept stocks witnessed a general increase. Crypto-focused companies such as:- Circle rose by 5.08%.- Riot Platforms rose by 4.93%.- Coinbase rose by 4.5%.- Strategy rose by 3%.Regarding treasury strategy companies:- SBET rose by 10.04%.- ALTS rose by 10.24%.- BMNR rose by 6.29%.

item.title: 「$125,000 Leveraged Long Position on ETH Liquidated」 Whale Long Position's Unrealized Gains Increase to $3.01 Million
item.description: On August 22nd, as per on-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa), following Powell's dovish speech, the unrealized gains of the "125k USD ETH Long Liquidation" whale's long position rose to 3.01 million USD.

item.title: Ethereum Surges Above $4600 Temporarily, With Nearly 7.62% Gain in the Last Hour
item.description: On August 22nd, according to HTX market data, Ethereum briefly exceeded $4600. It is currently trading at $4618, with a nearly 7.62% increase in the past hour.

item.title: Trump: Will Dismiss Fed Board Chair Cook if She Does Not Resign
item.description: August 22nd, Trump: If Fed Governor Powell does not tender his resignation, I will dismiss him. (Xinhua News Agency)
